Surrounding buildings and trees are faintly visible in the background, creating a subdued and mysterious atmosphere. As the video progresses, the lighting transitions to daylight, revealing more details of the city. The spherical structure gradually moves out of the frame, shifting the focus to the cityscape. Trees line the streets, adding greenery to the dense urban layout. The camera remains consistently above the city, providing a broad overview of the area. Text reading "Berlin, Germany" appears discreetly in the bottom right corner, offering context without interfering with the visual composition
